maqras.text: He dictus Advenit on board In the cognomen de DEUS est its sailing its mooring My Dominus est Forgiver Merciful
Prout it sailed them in waves like collis Noah alias his filius isolated O my filius advenit ride nos perfecit non est disbelievers
He dictus ego take refuge collis protect me aqua. He dictus Nihil protect anyone hodie deus judgment unus those venerabilis His mercy saved waves separated them he est among those qui drowned
It proclaimed O terra swallow tuus aqua O caelum cease aqua tunc subsided judgment fulfilled ark tandem rested on collis Judea. It tunc proclaimed transgressors periit
Noah implored his Dominus My Dominus my filius est member de my familia Tuus promise est truth. Vos est wisest de the wise
He dictus O Noah he non est de tuus familia. est unrighteous ask Me something vos non know Ego enlighten vos lest vos est the ignorant
He dictus My Dominus ego seek refuge Vos lest ego implore Vos again something ego non know Vos forgive me habet mercy me ego est losers
It proclaimed O Noah disembark pax blessings vos nations descend tuus companions. Prout pro alius nations descending ex vos nos beatus them pro awhile tunc commit them painful retribution
Hoc est news preter nos reveal vos. Vos non habet knowledge them - Nec vos nor tuus people - Ante hoc. Ergo est patient ultimate victory belongs to the righteous
To 窶連ad nos sent their frater Hood He dictus O my people worship DEUS; vos non habet alius deus Eum. Vos inventing
O my people ego non ask vos any wage My wage advenit unus 1 qui initiated me! Vos non understand
O my people seek forgiveness tuus Dominus tunc repent Eum. He tunc shower vos provisions caelum augment tuus strength! Non turn transgressors
They dictus O Hood vos non show nos any proof nos non relinquit noster deus on account de quod vos dictus. Nos nunquam est believers vos
Nos believe some de noster deus afflicted vos curse He dictus ego bear testis DEUS vos bear testis alias ego disown idols vos set
beside Eum. Ita dedit me tuus collective decision sine delay
Ego put my trust DEUS my Dominus tuus Dominus! ibi non est creature He non control My Dominus est rectus path
Vos turn ego delivered vos quod ego sent cum. My Dominus substitute alius people in tuus locus; vos non harm Eum in the parvus My Dominus est in control de totus things
When noster judgment advenit nos saved Hood those believed eum mercy nos. Nos saved them terrible retribution
Such est 窶連ad - they disregarded revelations their Dominus disobeyed His messengers subsequentis via omnis stubborn tyrant
Consequently they incurred condemnation in hoc saeculum Feria Resurrection. Indeed 窶連ad rejected their Dominus. Indeed 窶連ad people Hood periit
